price: Some people before you asked such questions, then became disbelievers as a result of that[68].
arabic: قَدۡ سَأَلَهَا قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡ ثُمَّ أَصۡبَحُواْ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: [68] For not carrying out what they were commanded.
